home.heroSubText: Master the challenge of efficiently sourcing, tracking, and hiring top talent aligned with your business needs, all on a single, centralized platform
home.heroCardSub1: Experience seamless and efficient HR operations with our dedicated, all-new HR assistant powered by GPT-4
home.heroCardSub2: Effortlessly track and manage all your offers with our integrated Offer Management System
home.heroCardSub3: Craft comprehensive job descriptions effortlessly and in no time with the help of AI
home.heroCardSub4: Utilize our built-in chat feature for seamless and efficient communication
home.benefitsText1: Take Control of Your Time with Our Intelligent Talent Automation Program
home.benefitsText2: Somhako is powered by an agile, AI-platform that enables recruiters to find top talents, Our dashboards use a one-tool approach, empowering recruiters to hire more efficiently from anywhere in the world.
home.benefitsTab1Text1: Review only the most relevant results
home.benefitsTab1Sub1: Novus carefully selects and evaluates candidate applications, providing you with ranked results to help you discover the top talents of your industry.
home.benefitsTab1Sub2: Somhako directs candidates towards the job openings that closely match their strengths so that you can access a strong talent pool that has been hand-picked for your job profile.
home.benefitsTab1Sub3: Somhako provides a seamless integration of third-party tools and platforms, thereby enabling collaborations and referral.
home.benefitsTab2Sub1: Streamline your daily operations and automate your tasks with Novus to create an efficient and meaningful talent management system.
home.benefitsTab2Sub2: Use our statistical observations and comprehensive analytics to develop talents that can promise a more fulfilling career trajectory.
home.benefitsTab2Sub3: Seamlessly integrate your calendar with our dashboard and leverage built-in chats for an uninterrupted and streamlined recruitment experience.
home.benefitsTab3Sub1: Novus implements a fast-paced approach to enable quick talent organisation and management.
home.benefitsTab3Sub2: Somhako uses a one-tool approach to create a dynamic environment that seamlessly adapts to your rhythm, enabling you to recruit the finest talents with great proficiency.
home.benefitsTab3Sub3: Novus takes over all the never-ending tasks and simplifies all tiresome operations to unlock a convenient and hassle-free hiring experience.
home.novusText2: significantly enhances recruiter efficiency, drastically reducing workload, and revolutionizing your hiring process from hours to mere seconds
home.spText1: Somhako’s realtime insights creates an environment that fosters unrivalled efficiency, allowing you to make strategic hiring choices.
home.wsText2: We are dedicated to lead you into a world of
home.wsText4: We aim to create trustworthy connections to elevate the standard of hiring practices throughout the world. We are transforming the world of HR management by creating an easy, streamlined procedure that fosters precision and guarantees efficiency in recruitment practices
home.wsSliderText1: Find the best talent with our cutting-edge intelligence technology
home.wsSliderSub1: Somhako’s AI meticulously curates candidate profiles to enhance your talent pool with our talent insights
home.wsSliderText2: Streamline processes and unlock better strategies
home.wsSliderSub2: Our intuitively designed AI software encourages you to optimise your time by only spending it on things that matter
home.wsSliderText3: Explore the potential of our AI integrated platform
home.wsSliderSub3: Novus acts as your HR assistant to help you deliver the best results by providing a fast-paced environment designed for your ease
home.wsSliderText4: Go global with a single click
home.wsSliderSub4: Somhako’s one-tool dashboard is integrated with multiple languages to ensure global accessibility and utility for all its users
home.dsText1: The dream team is closer than ever! Let us help you find it!
home.dsText2: Our AI has been designed to give you an edge in finding new talents. Let Somhako find the perfect fit for your requirements with our responsible talent intelligence platform
home.faqText1: Feel free to ask any product-related questions you may have.
home.faqQ1: Do i get charged additional for Novus ?
home.faqA1: No ! novus is part of the enterprise version the cost includes in your subscription.
home.faqQ2: Can i customize somhako based on our needs ?
home.faqA2: whitelabling is possible. Please contact the sales.
home.faqQ3: Can i use this tool globally for our companies global hiring ?
home.faqA3: Absolutely, Somhako is designed specifically for global use and global operation.
home.faqQ4: Is there any tool integration cost ?
home.faqA4: None, if you're looking to use Somhako, just email /call us, we will set the account for you.
home.faqQ5: How can I transfer all my existing data ? Will i be charged extra
home.faqA5: Of course, we will help you transfer all the existing data into Somhako with no additional cost.
home.faqA6: Not at all, Somhako  is affordable by any SMEs who want to use the tool, we have a pay as you go model.
home.faqQ7: What is this fixed and variable cost ?
home.faqA7: There are fixed monthly tool charges, and you have to pay per application , which means you only need to pay for applicants that come into your JD and don't have to pay anything additional.

about.text2: We believe in making everything about hiring super simple so that you can unlock a supercharged recruitment experience!
about.text5: Somhako has studied the HR industry over the last two decades.
about.text7: Recruiters typically take about a couple of days to share the shortlisted profiles with the hiring managers.
about.text9: Following up on hiring managers for feedbacks can add further delays. This process can usually span over 2-3 days.
about.text10: Manual scheduling of multiple interview rounds per candidate usually takes about 2-3 days. However, the entire interview process can last up to 10 days.
about.text11: To put it simply, completing the onboarding process for each profile typically takes around 20-30 days of meticulous screening and reviewing by the recruiter
about.text12: Revolutionizing Recruitment: Connecting Candidates to Ideal Jobs in Days, Not Weeks
about.text13: Our mission is to rapidly connect candidates to ideal jobs, slashing weeks to days. Our software tackles hiring challenges, prioritizing recruiter efficiency, so they focus on linking talent to fulfilling work environments.
about.text14: At Somhako, we want to empower people to expand their horizons and unlock new potentials as they work with pride and form meaningful connections.
about.text15: Novus: Your Dedicated HR Assistant for Smarter Hiring
about.text16: Statistics show that recruiters typically dedicate 2-3 days to screening and scheduling profiles. With Novus, streamline your hiring process through advanced AI technology. Identify top talent, rank candidates, and gain actionable insights swiftly. Let Novus, your dedicated hiring assistant, handle the heavy lifting, allowing you to focus on your strengths and not daily operations.
about.text17: Rapid, Effective, and Improved Hiring with Somhako - Boost Your Recruitment Success!

novus.text2: A day’s work done in seconds
novus.text3: Simplified Resume Screening with a Single-Text Approach
novus.text4: Novus, driven by AI, provides quick and accurate responses with a single conversation prompt. It utilizes an intuitive data-driven method to pre-screen resumes in the talent pool, presenting the most relevant candidates ranked by their professional aptitude.
novus.text5: Source Top Talent and Streamline the Next Steps with Automation
novus.text6: Unlock Premium Talent, Streamline Scheduling, and Secure Competitive Offers with Somhako-Novus. Maximize Sourcing Excellence for Outstanding Results. Manage a Strong Candidate Pipeline and Drive Business Success. Novus automates follow-up emails, reminders, and updates for stress-free communication
novus.text7: Strategic Recruitment Insights: Monitor Conversions and Optimize Sourcing
novus.text8: Efficiently Monitor Source-Specific Candidate Conversions and Identify Trends to Optimize Your Recruitment and Sourcing Strategies. Access Essential Data and Analytics for Informed Decision-Making, Ensuring Continuous Enhancement and Long-term Success in Your Recruitment Processes
novus.text9: Rapid, Effective, and Improved Hiring with Somhako - Boost Your Recruitment Success!

values.text1: Our values enlighten the way as we walk towards our mission of fostering rewarding work environments!
values.text4: Our dedication to honesty, ethics, and transparency is unwavering. Integrity is the cornerstone of our relationships with customers, partners, and employees. Your trust is priceless, and we remain devoted to keeping our promises and upholding our moral principles
values.text6: At Somhako, we believe in the beauty of simplicity. Our mission is to streamline the hiring process and foster meaningful connections between our clients and exceptional talent in a fast-paced world.
values.text8: We believe empathy and kindness bridge algorithms and people. Guided by ethics, we empower individuals and global companies. Our aim is to unlock potential and revive ease and self-driven productivity in work
values.text11: Somhako fosters a fast-paced work environment with a deep-learning HR assistant driving proactive actions. Our one-tool approach ensures swift task resolution. We are dedicated to maximizing time optimization and efficiency for our clients like never before.
values.text13: Recruiters often grapple with overwhelming tasks. Somhako strives to reclaim their time with intelligent automation and an AI-powered HR assistant. Our goal is to lighten their load, allowing them to focus on connecting ideal candidates with clients while we handle the rest
values.text14: Rapid, Effective, and Improved Hiring with Somhako - Boost Your Recruitment Success!
